definitions: in a way that is free from outside control or influence

examples.text: the government must prove its ability to govern independently
the independently run museum receives no public funding
the figures have been independently audited

shortDefinitions: in way that is free from outside control or influence

examples.text: disabled people living independently in their own homes
information for those who are travelling independently

definitions: in a way that is not connected with another; individually

examples.text: decisions are made independently of consumers
why should each of us independently spend time creating the same course?

shortDefinitions: in way that is not connected with another
